Detailed Description

TREX specific propagator.

This class offers an easy connection from Europa to the reactor inside TREX. It allows to implement constraint that will use information from TREX reactor through the Assembly class.

It is used specifically by ReactorConstraint abstract class that can be used to implement such constraints.

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
